results.title: Effects of simvastatin on the expression of heme oxygenase-1 in human RPE cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ may have some clinical benefits in preventing @DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal diseases@@@ associated with oxidative stress, such as @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_Type_II</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006009 @@@AMD@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim KJ, Kim KS, Kim NR, Chin HS. Effects of simvastatin on the expression of heme oxygenase-1 in human RPE cells. Invest Ophthalmol Vis Sci. 2012 Sep 21;53(10):6456-64. PMID: 22918643
